gurmukhi: ਕਵਨ ਅੰਜਨ ਕਰਿ ਲੋਚਨ ਬਿਲੋਕੀਅਤ ਕਵਨ ਕੁੰਡਲ ਕਰਿ ਸ੍ਵਨ ਸੁਨੀਜੀਅੈ
transliteration: Kavan Anjan Kari Lochan Bilokeeata , Kavan Koundal Kari Sravan Souneejeeai ?
translation: By the use of which collyrium in the eyes can one see the beloved Lord? What ear-rings can help hear his sound?

gurmukhi: ਕਵਨ ਤੰਮੋਲ ਕਰਿ ਰਸਨਾ ਸੁਜਸੁ ਰਸੈ ਕੌਨ ਕਰਿ ਕੰਕਨ ਨਮਸਕਾਰ ਕੀਜੀਅੈ
transliteration: Kavan Tanmol Kari Rasanaa Sujasu Rasai , Kaoun Kari Kankan Namasakaar Keejeeai ?
translation: Which betel leaf when chewed can help the tongue repeat the supreme praise of the beloved Lord? What bangles should be worn in the hands to greet and salute Him?

gurmukhi: ਕਵਨ ਕੁਸਮ ਹਾਰ ਕਰਿ ੳੁਰ ਧਾਰੀਅਤ ਕੌਨ ਅੰਗੀਅਾ ਸੁ ਕਰਿ ਅੰਕਮਾਲ ਦੀਜੀਅੈ
transliteration: Kavan Kousam Haar Kari Ur Dhaareeata , Kaoun Angeeaa Su Kari Ankamaal Deejeeai ?
translation: What flower garland can make Him reside in the heart? What bodice should be worn to embrace Him with hands?

gurmukhi: ਕੳੁਨ ਹੀਰ ਚੀਰ ਲਪਟਾੲਿ ਕੈ ਲਪੇਟ ਲੀਜੈ ਕਵਨ ਸੰਜੋਗ ਪ੍ਰਿਯਾ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਰਸੁ ਪੀਜੀਅੈ ॥੬੨੬॥
transliteration: Kaoun Heer Cheer Lapataai Kai Lapayt Leejai , Kavan Sanjog Priyaa Praym Rasu Peejeeai ?626?
translation: What dress and diamond can be worn to entice Him? With what method can the union of the beloved be relished? The crux of the whole thing is that all embellishments are worthless. Relishing His love can only unite one with Him.  (626)
